dmca.title: RE: URGENT DMCA Notice of re. www.bellymaternity.com sent on behalf of Nicholas J. Jo
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Peggy_Moriatis@timeinc.com [mailto:Peggy_Moriatis@timeinc.com] 
Posted At: Tuesday, July 11, 2006 1:06 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: RE: URGENT DMCA Notice of re. www.bellymaternity.com sent
on behalf of Nicholas J. Jollymore
Subject: FW: RE: URGENT DMCA Notice of re. www.bellymaternity.com sent
on behalf of Nicholas J. Jollymore



DMCA Copyright Infringement

 

Dear ISP:

 

I am an attorney for Time Inc., the corporate publisher of PEOPLE
Magazine.  This will put you on notice of a copyright infringement on a
web site, Belly Maternity, hosted by your organization.  This
infringement appears at: http://www.bellymaternity.com/index.php.

 

PEOPLE Magazine owns the copyright of the cover of its June 19, 2006
issue, which includes a photograph of Angelina Jolie and Brad Pitt and
their baby girl, Shiloh Nouvel.  Belly Maternity's reproduction of
PEOPLE's cover for the commercial purpose of selling goods is a
violation of PEOPLE Magazine's copyright under the Digital Millennium
Copyright Act.

 

This letter is an official notification under the provisions of Section
512(c) of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act to effect removal of this
Copyright infringement.  I hereby demand that you immediately (TODAY)
issue a cancel message, as specified in RFC 1036, for the specified
postings and prevent the infringer, who is identified by its Web
address, from posting the infringing Photograph to your servers in the
future, and from violating PEOPLE Magazine's trademark rights under the
Lanham Act. Please be advised that by law, as a service provider, you
must "expeditiously remove or disable access to" the infringing
Photograph upon receiving this notice. Noncompliance may result in a
loss of the possibility of immunity under the DMCA.

 

I have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner
complained of herein is not authorized by PEOPLE Magazine, their
respective licensing representatives, or the law.  The information
provided herein is accurate to the best of my knowledge.  I hereby swear
under penalty of perjury that I am authorized to act on behalf of PEOPLE
Magazine for matters pertaining to notification of infringement of its
exclusive rights in its copyrighted and trademarked material.

 

Please email me, or send to me at the address listed below, a prompt
response indicating the actions you have taken to resolve this matter.

 

Very truly yours,

 

 

Nicholas J. Jollymore

Deputy General Counsel

Time Inc.

1271 Avenue of the Americas

New York, NY 10020

* (O) 212 522-3083

* (F) 212 467-0844

 

 

 

 

Peggy S. Moriatis

Time Inc.

1271 Avenue of the Americas

New York, New York 10020

Office: (212) 522-4559

 

 

========================================================================
================================================
This message is the property of Time Inc. and is intended only for the
use of the addressee(s) and may be legally privileged and/or
confidential.
========================================================================
================================================
